scripts.bundle: for file in ./designs/*.js; do rollup -i $file -o out/$(basename $file) -f es -p 'terser={mangle: {reserved: ["draw"]}}'; rollup -i ./designs/x/x.js -o out/x/$(basename x.js) -f es -p 'terser={mangle: {reserved: ["draw"]}}'; done; for dir in ./designs/*/; do for file in dir; do rollup -i ./designs/$(dir)/$(file).js -o out/$(dir)/$(basename $(file)) -f es -p 'terser={mangle: {reserved: ["draw"]}}'; done done
